title: The Sandlot kids
creator_credit: Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation, Island World, Dale de la Torre, William S. Gilmore and David Mickey Evans
brief_description: The Sandlot kids is a heartwarming film about friendship. Scotty Smalls is new in town and the Sandlot Kids welcome him to their gang even though he can’t play baseball. Their summer adventures playing at the sandlot and confronting the dreaded beast living behind the left field fence changes Scotty’s life forever.
creator_credit_for_label: Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation, Island World, Dale de la Torre, William S. Gilmore and David Mickey Evans
